channel.title: ~~MimzScape [508]~~ (This is NOT A PROJECT!)
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt][font=Batik Regular]MimzScape 508[/font][/size] [URL=http://www.mimzscape.smfforfree3.com/][IMG]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/8297/mimzscapepromojh3.jpg[/img][/URL]
[b]Hey there, to start this off this is NOT an open project. I'm not hosting a project for others, I'm not even going to call it a project, so before you say anything... This is NOT a project!
For those of you that want to know what MimzScape is, you've come to the right place. I'm working on my server called MimzScape [508] and it's pretty cool so far. I currently have...
[ul][li]Almost full combat skills working [/li] [li]A very short variety of pets [/li] [li]A somewhat crappy version of "Summoning" [/li] [li]Almost full range (I need to fix the projectile's movement, it kinda curves off to the side) [/li] [li]Somewhat of a quest... [/li][/ul]
So that was my list of things I have done so far (within a week) and I'm still working on it, I still need some help with some stuff (Although I'm not going to ask for [u]any[/u] help on MoparScape because I'll get muted, so again I'm still NOT asking for help... And this still is NOT a project... I'm just showing what I'm working on! So anyway, this is what I'm still trying to improve
[ul][li]Full Magic Skill [/li] [li]Full and flawless Summoning [/li] [li]Fix Range projectiles [/li] [li]Make full bounty hunter and also pking [/li] [li]Make an amazing pvp content available [/li] [li]Full Hunter skill [/li] [li]Re-Make Construction (to make it better) [/li] [li]Make every pet available (including shops) [/li] [li]Make all Summoning monsters available (along with shop) [/li] [li]Maybe make a personal touch to Summoning (ie. God Summoning for the level 99's) [/li][/ul]
[i]So, that's what I've been working on, and I still am working on it... I would like some help, but again I'm NOT asking for anyone's help! I don't want this thread to get locked because it's made into being a "project", because it's NOT A PROJECT![/i] [/center]

If you delete that then it’s just “Hey, check out what I’ve done.” Which would require more pictures but is alright for the time being.
[/quote]
Why don’t you just make a thread for him if you’re so caught up about it. Shit man…[/quote]

I’m just trying to make sure he’s following the rules.

Read full topic

item.title: ~~MimzScape [508]~~ (This is NOT A PROJECT!)
item.dc:creator: @wolf_scaper wolf scaper
item.description:
@wolf_scaper wrote:

[quote=“Mimz, post:1, topic:234176”][center][size=20pt][font=Batik Regular]MimzScape 508[/font][/size]

[b]Hey there, to start this off this is NOT an open project. I’m not hosting a project for others, I’m not even going to call it a project, so before you say anything… This is NOT a project!

For those of you that want to know what MimzScape is, you’ve come to the right place. I’m working on my server called MimzScape [508] and it’s pretty cool so far. I currently have…

[ul][li]Almost full combat skills working [/li]
[li]A very short variety of pets [/li]
[li]A somewhat crappy version of “Summoning” [/li]
[li]Almost full range (I need to fix the projectile’s movement, it kinda curves off to the side) [/li]
[li]Somewhat of a quest… [/li][/ul]

So that was my list of things I have done so far (within a week) and I’m still working on it, I still need some help with some stuff (Although I’m not going to ask for any help on MoparScape because I’ll get muted, so again I’m still NOT asking for help… And this still is NOT a project… I’m just showing what I’m working on! So anyway, this is what I’m still trying to improve

[ul][li]Full Magic Skill [/li]
[li]Full and flawless Summoning [/li]
[li]Fix Range projectiles [/li]
[li]Make full bounty hunter and also pking [/li]
[li]Make an amazing pvp content available [/li]
[li]Full Hunter skill [/li]
[li]Re-Make Construction (to make it better) [/li]
[li]Make every pet available (including shops) [/li]
[li]Make all Summoning monsters available (along with shop) [/li]
[li]Maybe make a personal touch to Summoning (ie. God Summoning for the level 99’s) [/li][/ul]

So, that’s what I’ve been working on, and I still am working on it… I would like some help, but again I’m NOT asking for anyone’s help! I don’t want this thread to get locked because it’s made into being a “project”, because it’s NOT A PROJECT!
[/center][/quote]
very interesting…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Mimz Mimz
item.description:
@Mimz wrote:

NO!!! The section is Help/Development
In case you missed the DEVELOPMENT part, here it is again DEVELOPMENT!

Development means show what you have done, or are currently working on… If you want the Websters version I’ll give it to you that way…

Read full topic

@Mimz wrote:

I’m not advertising…
Advertising would be

Come visit Google.com!!
Come visit Google.com!!
Come visit Google.com!!

or something like, Go to the Google Forums at Google.com
all I said was that “If you are interested”… In other words I really don’t care if you go to the forums or not… Because I’m not hosting a project and getting it locked again…

For those of you that want to know what MimzScape is, you’ve come to the right place. I’m working on my server called MimzScape [508] and it’s pretty cool so far. I currently have…
